Title: Enhances criminal penalties for criminal mischief and larceny offenses committed at a place of religious worship
Summary: Enhances criminal penalties for criminal mischief and larceny offenses committed at a place of religious worship and for cemetery desecration.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to criminal mischief and larceny offenses committed at a place of religious worship and to cemetery desecration
